page.title: 11LOCAL NEWS-'OUTLOOK'
page.content: The Outlook is the local Free newspaper 0magazine. It tells the people in Perton all the imformation that they need: For example Clubs and Socities. As the Outlook is a Free magazin e i make its money from advertising. For a half page advert it would cost #80.00. For a full page advertisement it would cost #120.00. Of course you do not have to use such large adverts; the smallest the paper would take could measure a mere six centimetres. The prices quoted above have been based on four recent issues of Outlook(1985).
